âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Automated installation script for web proxy server â€¢ Supports WebSocket/GRPC/HttpUpgrade/XHTTP via Nginx â€¢ Multiple user and domain support on port 443 â€¢ Auto SSL renewal and daily service reloads â€¢ Automatic daily backups of x-ui.db
ðŸ“– Summary: XUI-PRO is a shell script that automates the installation and configuration of a secure web proxy server. It integrates various tools like Nginx, Xray, V2rayA, Cloudflare, and Tor to provide a robust solution for bypassing internet restrictions and enhancing network security.
